mapper.select: select subscribeto from subscribetable where subscribefrom = #{userID}

select s.subscribeno, d.diarytitle, u.userid, u.usernickname, u.userimg from subscribetable s, diarytable d, user_table u where s.subscribeto = #{subscribeID} and s.subscribeto = d.diaryuserid and d.diaryuserid = u.userid

select s.subscribeno, d.diarytitle, u.userid, u.usernickname, u.userimg from subscribetable s, diarytable d, user_table u where subscribefrom = #{id} and (s.subscribeto like '%'||#{search}||'%' or d.diarytitle like '%'||#{search}||'%') and s.subscribeto = d.diaryuserid and d.diaryuserid = u.userid
